# couchbase-capella_app_endpoint_default_oidc_provider (Resource)

Manage the default OpenID Connect provider for an App Endpoint.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_endpoint_name` (String) The name of the App Endpoint.
- `app_service_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the Capella App Service.
- `cluster_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the Capella cluster.
- `organization_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the Capella organization.
- `project_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the Capella project.
- `provider_id` (String) The Id of the OpenID Connect provider to set as the default for this App Endpoint.
